Class OperationPanel.LUActionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • OperationPanel.LUActionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    OperationPanel

    public class OperationPanel.LUActionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    When the LU Pivot button is clicked, the app will: 
    
  1.  Get the user input Matrix and Vector from Matrix and Vector text area
  2.  Verify if the sizes of Matrix and Vector match for operation, if it is not, result in a exception
  3.  Calculate its determinant, if it is 0, it is a singular Matrix, ends the computation and show the result in result panel
  4.  Compute the reordered Matrix
  5.  Compute the lower and upper Matrix
  6.  Solve the differential system
  7.  Display all the information in the result panel @see MainFrame.resultTextArea
    See Also:
    OperationPanel.getMatrix(), OperationPanel.getVector(), Matrix.toString(), Matrix.CalcDeterminant(), Matrix.Matrix(int, int), Matrix.Matrix(Matrix), Matrix.reorder(Matrix, int, Matrix), Matrix.mult(Matrix), Matrix.inverse(Matrix, Matrix), Matrix.lu_fact(Matrix, Matrix, Matrix, int), Matrix.lu_solve(Matrix, Matrix, Vector), Vector.Vector(int), Vector.size(), Vector.toString()
